title: South African Chickpeas with Aubergine
method: Prep: finely chop the aubergine and slice the green beans.
Bring a shallow pan of seasoned liquid to a bare simmer.
Poach chickpeas 8–12 min until opaque and flaky.
Rest meat 3–5 min if applicable. Season to taste with lemon, herbs, and chili to preference.
Plate as suggested below and enjoy.
plating: Serve chickpeas neatly over grains with veg to one side; finish with chopped oregano, a wedge of lemon, and a drizzle of olive oil for a clean South African presentation.
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal, more if training on the day.
swaps: Swap grains for cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Use tofu or chicken interchangeably to suit dietary preference.
Add chili to taste for more heat.

title: Seitan & Sweetcorn Traybake
method: Prep: finely chop the sweetcorn and slice the peppers.
Preheat to 230°C.
Toss seitan with oil, salt, pepper and spices; spread on a tray with veg.
Broil for 22–28 minutes until seitan is cooked through (75°C internal for poultry).
Rest meat 3–5 min if applicable. Season to taste with lemon, herbs, and chili to preference.
Plate as suggested below and enjoy.
plating: Serve seitan neatly over grains with veg to one side; finish with chopped parsley, a wedge of lemon, and a drizzle of olive oil for a clean Serbian presentation.
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal, more if training on the day.
swaps: Swap grains for cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Use tofu or chicken interchangeably to suit dietary preference.
Add chili to taste for more heat.
